    • Method Detail

      • getUsage

        public void getUsage(OutputStream outputStream,
            TimeAggregationMode timeAggregationMode,
            String source,
            Collection<String> categories,
            org.joda.time.DateTime fromTimestamp,
            org.joda.time.DateTime toTimestamp,
            TenantContext context)
              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: MeterUserApi
        Get usage data for all metrics (given a set of categories) as Json using an accumulating filter.

        Emulate: select sum(value) from chunks group by source, category, date_trunc('timeAggregationMode', timestamp);

        Specified by:
        getUsage in interface MeterUserApi
        Parameters:
        outputStream - stream to write the data to
        timeAggregationMode - granularity of the accumulator
        source - source
        categories - categories
        fromTimestamp - earliest timestamp to consider (inclusive)
        toTimestamp - latest timestamp to consider (inclusive)
        context - call context
        Throws:
        IOException

            TenantContext context)
              throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: MeterUserApi
        Get usage data as Json using an accumulating filter.

        Emulate: select sum(value) from chunks group by source, category, metric, date_trunc('timeAggregationMode', timestamp);

        Specified by:
        getUsage in interface MeterUserApi
        Parameters:
        outputStream - stream to write the data to
        timeAggregationMode - granularity of the accumulator
        source - source
        metricsPerCategory - mapping of metrics per category
        fromTimestamp - earliest timestamp to consider (inclusive)
        toTimestamp - latest timestamp to consider (inclusive)
        context - call context
        Throws:
        IOException - generic I/O exception

      • incrementUsageAndAggregate

        public void incrementUsageAndAggregate(String source,
                              String categoryName,
                              String metricName,
                              org.joda.time.DateTime timestamp,
                              CallContext context)
        Description copied from interface: MeterUserApi
        Shortcut API to record a usage value of "1" for a given category and metric.

        This will also store an aggregation of all usage data across all metrics for that category. This is useful if one wants to store fine grained usage information (e.g. number of minutes used per cell phone number), while keeping a fast access path to the aggregate (e.g. number of minutes used across all cell phone numbers).

        Specified by:
        incrementUsageAndAggregate in interface MeterUserApi
        Parameters:
        source - source name for this usage
        categoryName - category name for this usage
        metricName - metric name associated with this category
        context - call context

      • recordUsage

        public void recordUsage(String source,
               Map<String,Map<String,Object>> samplesForCategoriesAndMetrics,
               org.joda.time.DateTime timestamp,
               CallContext context)
        Description copied from interface: MeterUserApi
        Fine grained usage API. This is used to record e.g. "X has used 2 credits at 2012/02/04 4:12pm".
        Specified by:
        recordUsage in interface MeterUserApi
        Parameters:
        source - source name for this usage
        samplesForCategoriesAndMetrics - samples per metric and category
        timestamp - timestamp of this usage
        context - tenant context
